      • create

        public void create(String index,
          String type,
          String id,
          long version,
          org.elasticsearch.common.xcontent.XContentBuilder builder)
        Description copied from interface: Action
        Create action. Indicating that an object has been built and is ready to be indexed. The source of the document is held by the XContentBuilder. The document is only indexed if no document with that index/type/id exists.
        Specified by:
        create in interface Action
        Parameters:
        index - the index
        type - the type
        id - the id
        version - the version
        builder - the builder
